resources.string: Select ponies to show\nNOTE: Don\'t select too many ponies at once or the Live Wallpaper WILL CRASH! This depends on the device.\nPress the menu-button for more info

This application is made by FrankkieNL
http://frankkie.nl/

This applications uses the following libraries:
- OpenCSV
http://opencsv.sourceforge.net/

- Android GifView
https://code.google.com/p/android-gifview/

All mentioned software is licenced under the Apache V2 Licence.
http://www.apache.org/licenses/LICENSE-2.0

Pony images have been provided by the Desktop Ponies Team.
The images have a CC BY-NC-SA 3.0 licence
http://creativecommons.org/licenses/by-nc-sa/3.0/

The default background image is made by Austiniousi
http://austiniousi.deviantart.com/art/Ponyville-Background-324408425
